no.ntnu.fp.net.co
Class ConnectionImpl

java.lang.Object
  no.ntnu.fp.net.co.AbstractConnection
      no.ntnu.fp.net.co.ConnectionImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Connection
public class ConnectionImpl
extends AbstractConnection

Implementation of the Connection-interface.

This class implements the behaviour in the methods specified in the interface Connection over the unreliable, connectionless network realised in ClSocket. The base class, AbstractConnection implements some of the functionality, leaving message passing and error handling to this implementation.

Author:
Sebjørn Birkeland and Stein Jakob Nordbø
See Also:
Connection, no.ntnu.fp.net.cl.ClSocket

java.io.IOException - If there's an I/O error.
java.net.SocketTimeoutException - If timeout expires before connection is completed.

Listen for, and accept, incoming connections.

isValid

protected boolean isValid(KtnDatagram packet)
Test a packet for transmission errors. This function should only called with data or ACK packets in the ESTABLISHED state.

Specified by:
isValid in class AbstractConnection
Parameters:
packet - Packet to test.
Returns:
true if packet is free of errors, false otherwise.
